ST23-001.name: Uta ST23-001
ST23-001.effect: If you have a Character with 10000 power or more, give this card in your hand −4 cost. [Blocker]

ST23-002.name: Shanks ST23-002
ST23-002.effect: If your opponent has a Character with 8000 base power or more, give this card in your hand −3 cost. [On Play] If your Leader has the {Red-Haired Pirates} type or is [Uta], your Leader gains +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.

ST23-003.name: Benn Beckman ST23-003
ST23-003.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: If your Leader has the {Red-Haired Pirates} type, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 base power or less.

ST23-004.name: Monkey D. Luffy ST23-004
ST23-004.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and this Character: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −1000 power during this turn.

ST23-005.name: Yasopp ST23-005
ST23-005.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.
